name: The Amazing Ruff n' Tumble
description:
Originally made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019! The theme was "Only One".

Come one, come all! Canine superstar Ruff n' Tumble is touring every animal circus in the tri-county area! Watch in amazement as he is shot from a cannon and flies like a bird, if birds didn't have wings! Control him with a SINGLE BUTTON to make him float and boost in the air! Help Ruff reach the end of four death-defying courses! If he touches the ground ONCE, it's OVER!

  • Design & Music: Alex Rosetti
  • Art & Animation: Kyle Labriola
